summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for the period from June 1, 2016, to June 30, 2016. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and the ending balance of the account. The statement reflects various transactions, including payroll fees and health insurance premiums.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is mentioned as the contact person for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $343,698.46 on June 1, 2016.
The account experienced various transactions including payroll fees and health insurance premiums.
The ending balance of the account as of June 30, 2016, was $294,738.30.
There were multiple preauthorized debits for fees and premiums throughout the month.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
